GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CUST_NAME.title: Customer Name
CUST_NAME.instruction: Write your full name as it appears on your credit card.

CARD_NUMBER.title: Credit Card Number
CARD_NUMBER.instruction: Enter your 16-digit Credit Card number. (You must provide either this OR your registered mobile number below).
rejections: Neither Card Number nor Mobile Number provided

MOBILE_NUMBER.title: Registered Mobile Number
MOBILE_NUMBER.instruction: Enter your 10-digit mobile number linked to the bank. (Mandatory if Credit Card number is not provided above).

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction: Enter your Customer ID (found in your welcome letter or internet banking).

DESIRED_LIMIT.title: Desired Credit Limit
DESIRED_LIMIT.instruction: Write the new total credit limit you want in words (e.g., 'Two Lakhs').

OCCUPATION_TYPE.title: Occupation
OCCUPATION_TYPE.instruction: Tick the box that describes your current job status (e.g., Salaried, Self Employed, Student).

COMPANY_NAME.title: Company Name
COMPANY_NAME.instruction: If you are Salaried or Self-Employed, write the name of your company or business here.
rejections: Company name missing for Salaried/Self-Employed applicants

SALARY_ACC_HOLDER.title: IDFC Salary Account Holder
SALARY_ACC_HOLDER.instruction: Tick this box if your salary is credited directly to an IDFC FIRST Bank account. (If you check this, you do NOT need to attach income documents).

DOC_SALARY_SLIP.title: Document: Salary Slips
DOC_SALARY_SLIP.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching your recent salary slips. (Required unless you have an IDFC Salary Account).

DOC_IT_RETURN.title: Document: IT Return
DOC_IT_RETURN.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching your latest Income Tax Return (ITR) acknowledgment.

DOC_BANK_STMT.title: Document: Bank Statement
DOC_BANK_STMT.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching your last 3 months' bank statement showing salary credits.

DOC_OTHERS.title: Document: Others
DOC_OTHERS.instruction: Tick this if you are attaching other financial proofs.

SIGNATURE.title: Customer Signature
SIGNATURE.instruction: Sign here to confirm you agree to the terms. This signature must match the one on your card.

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section must be completed by bank officials only, including KYC verification, service request number, employee ID, branch details, and official signature.
